title: Executive Order-Amendments of Civil Service Rules
content: SIR: This Commission has the honor to recommend that Special Departmental Rule No. I be amended by adding to the exceptions from examination therein declared the following:
"In the Department of the Treasury, in the life-saving service: Topographer and hydrographer."
We have the honor to be, your obedient servants,
citation: Benjamin Harrison, Executive Order-Amendments of Civil Service Rules Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/205294
